title: Create contact merge history logging system with per-contact audit trail
summary: Implement comprehensive logging system that tracks all merge operations with detailed per-contact audit trails. System must capture before/after field states, timestamp all changes, and maintain queryable history for compliance and debugging purposes.

title: Build 24-hour merge rollback functionality
summary: Develop rollback capability allowing users to undo contact merge operations within 24-hour window. System must restore pre-merge state for all affected contacts and update any dependent records accordingly.
